ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 26
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, I heard about this.  I m truly looking forward to trompting about the lands of EverQuest as a skeleton. :-)  I can imagine the other players who aren t
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, I heard about this. I'm truly looking forward to trompting about the lands of EverQuest as a skeleton. :-) I can imagine the other players who aren't familiar with the spell, thinking you're some wondering NPC or whatever. Especially if you have a last name.

Though... this makes me wonder. When we change into the form of a skeleton, does this make us susceptible to the Ward Undead line of spells? Ouch, beware if you're +pvp, if so!

~Mysk


> From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
>
> A weird one, I got rid of it. Note that AoD used to turn you into a
> skeleton, but no longers does that. The next level of this spell is at
> level 34 or 39 I believe and it WILL turn you into a skeleton or change some
> features or something. ;)
>
> Malark
